title: On a Constructive Proof of Kolmogorov’s Superposition Theorem

tldr.text: It is shown that monotonicity and continuity hold for Köppen's ψ, and a correct constructive proof of Kolmogorov’s superposition theorem for continuous inner functions ψ is presented similar to Sprecher's approach.
